alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 18 at 3:39PM EDT until October 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN MOBILE AND BALDWIN COUNTIES IN ALABAMA, PORTIONS OF INTERIOR SOUTH-CENTRAL ALABAMA, AND THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH ERC AND KBDI VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN MOBILE AND BALDWIN COUNTIES IN ALABAMA, PORTIONS OF INTERIOR SOUTH-CENTRAL ALABAMA, AND THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 056, 057, 058, 059, 060, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...North winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
